message.name: ERR_FISCALYEAR_XFV_STARTDATE_NOT_AFTER_ENDDATE
message.locale: The Start Date should not be after the End Date.

message.name: ERR_FISCALYEAR_FV_STARTDATE_MANDATORY
message.locale: Please enter Start Date for Fiscal Year.

message.name: ERR_FISCALYEAR_FV_ENDDATE_MANDATORY
message.locale: Please enter End Date for Fiscal Year.

message.name: ERR_FISCALYEAR_XRV_FISCALYEAR_ALREADY_EXISTS_FOR_DATERANGE_CATEGORY_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The Date Range you have chosen is overlapping with an existing Fiscal Year date range of same Category.

message.name: ERR_FISCALYEAR_FV_NAME_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: Please enter a Fiscal Year Name.

message.name: ERR_FISCALYEAR_XRV_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_IF_ACTIVE_FUND_FISCAL_YEAR_EXISTS
message.locale: The Fiscal Year cannot be deleted, an active Fund Fiscal Year record exists.

message.name: ERR_FISCALYEAR_XRV_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED_IF_ACTIVE_FUND_FISCAL_YEAR_EXISTS
message.locale: The Fiscal Year cannot be modified, an active Fund Fiscal Year record exists.

message.name: ERR_FUNDFISCALYEAR_XRV_CANNOT_DELETE_FUNDFISCALYEAR_AS_LINEITEM_HAS_BALANCE
message.locale: The Fund Fiscal Year cannot be deleted as it has an allocated budget balance.

message.name: ERR_FISCALYEAR_FV_YEAR_MUST_BE_VALID_NUMBER
message.locale: The year must be a valid number.
